body: An inferno rages inside you, causing your body to radiate intense heat.
name: Blazing Aura
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Ifrits/New Racial Rules/Ifrit Feats/Blazing Aura

sections.body: Inner Flame, Scorching Weapons, character level 13th, ifrit.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When you use Scorching Weapons, on your turn as a free action, you may create an aura of heat that lasts for 1 round. This aura deals 1d6 points of fire damage to any creature that begins its turn adjacent to you.
sections.name: Benefit
